DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial determine formula give infant experience fussiness , cry , cramp , gas , and/or diarrhea , accept well tolerate help resolve symptom .
DOC.brief_title: The Evaluation Infant Formulas Fed Infants With Common Feeding Problems
DOC.criteria: Subject 2 12 week age Subject currently receive milkbased lactosecontaining formula least 5 day sole item diet Subject never switch lactose free formula The parent/guardian fill quality life questionnaire female least 18 year age The parent/guardian report unsolicited history feed problem include fussiness/crying/cramping , gas , diarrhea Signed Informed Consent Subject daycare 4 hour per day ( 20 hour per week ) Subject serious perinatal complication , underlie disease congenital malformation impair normal formula feed The parent/guardian fill quality life questionnaire chronic illness , e.g . diabetes , inflammatory bowel disease illness require daily medication treatment Subject acute infectious diarrhea intercurrent illness
